name: Sherilynne DeMaio
text: These folks are GREAT!! I don't know why they are so much better than the other LC's, but they ARE! They always have my cheese pizza hot and ready, their thin crust is delicious, and they're super friendly. This is my go-to pizza place.

name: Tim McNulty
text: Super nice staff. Very accommodating. They even give me from cookies when I ask for them with the purchase of a pizza. Always on top of it and have always made top notch pizzas when I called them in. Lunch special is the best. Thin crust pizza easy sauce is amazing too

name: Mike Eiben
text: Love this particular Little Caesars because of the great customer service. Almost every time I've been in here the owner himself is working the front register; He's always happy to see his customers and seems to really care about his …More

name: Daniela Montes
text: Ordered garlic cheese bread and a side of sauce. The sauce was an extra two dollars. Both items were very cold and the cheese bread looked like it was sitting there for a while because all of the oil had seeped out. To make it worse, I …More

name: Rachel Green
text: The prices are great, we got a 2 liter, crazy bread, and a pizza for under $10. However, when we got home the pizza was very dry looking and tasted really stale. Also, it was barely warm and mind you we only live a half mile away. The box …More

text:

name: Felicia
text: The girls that work here are super friendly!! You guys are great!!

name: Alan Gatlin
text: Always good and quick . Be sure to get a fresh one! The pretzel crust version is excellent

name: V. Vida
text: Fast and with no waiting and at a good price. My son loves their pizza and he's happy,  so I'm happy.

text: The prices and pizza is great BUT recently the customer service on 12/31/18 on S. Melrose in Vista, ca. What happened to a customer is always right? I witnessed a young Hispanic girl who was working as a  front cashier and working in the …More

text: Called in a order told me 15 min. I show up they do not have the order have to wait 15 more minutes after...

text: Simple cheap tasty pizza what more can you ask for?

text: Eat there every Sunday, love the staff and the way they treat me.

name: Zerex Mike
text: Love the place. Always Friendly.

name: Christina Wahl
text: Good for what it is. Piping hot pizzas! Worth the 10 minute wait.

name: Debra Schroeder
text: I haven't had Little Caesars in forever.  Literally.  The last time I had Little Caesars it still came on the flat cardboard with a paper wrapper.  Wait, did I just date myself? …More

name: Talisa Brown
text: Very friendly and polite the two women who helped us were awesome eventjo they had like 10 mins until they closed they make sure we were happy and satisfied thank you!!

name: Barry Richman
text: Excellent pizza,  real NY style not found in North Shore

name: Luis Soto
text: Best crazy bread out of all the vista locations!

name: William Leach
text: For the price this is a fantastic pizza. Quick and good. What more do you want.!

name: Crystina Condon
text: I mean who can argue about their awesome 8.99 meal deal? Large pepperoni with breadsticks, sauce and 2 liter soda. Best pizza deal around

name: Neil Cadwallader
text: Great prices for completely adequate pizza.

name: Daniel Huerta
text: The only little caesars where I’ve seen the $5 pizza become a $6 pizza and the $6 most best pizza become a $7 most best pizza. Greedy people, they know high schoolers don’t have that much money and they raise the prices. The only location to do so!

name: Laurie francis
text: Its little Caesar's its not amazing pizza it's at best sub par

name: Yvette Dial
text: Served the lunch combo at 7pm on a normal weekday, like the poster said they should! Great option for a single female who can't finish this in one sitting, let alone a whole pizza.

name: Alonso Torres
text: The pizza is really good

name: Pepe In
text: I usually like this place but the new gettleman for the second time has not given me anything freshly made when i ask at the register. The older gettleman always asked before or made upon request which was a great option. Now it doesn't seem it's worth the drive anymore.

name: Robert McSheridan
text: Horrible customer service.. took forever for lunch combo.. all employees just stand around the back

name: Kazoo LaLoo
text: My favorite pizza is jalapeño pineapple with extra cheese and no sauce. I've ordered it at several different places and no one has ever made it just right. This place not only made my pizza perfect, but they were also very friendly. This is now my all time favorite pizza place.

name: ECREAM
text: I know the draw is that the pizza is $5 but the taste of the pizza and in the freshness of the pizza was so low it tastes worse than a frozen one from the supermarket

name: Laura Hawkins
text: Cheap and tasty. Employees and owner are always friendly.

name: Yolanda Ware
text: Pizza was soggy and gross couldn't even eat the pizza.  I wouldn't waste my time or money.

name: Larry Warren
text: If super cheap and quick is what you're after, This Little Caesars will not disappoint!

name: Abraham Betancourt
text: It is the worst with service. They never answer the phone. They close to early and too top it all off there pizza is a 50 50 either its good or its cardboard pizza.

text: Always out of something or other when I visit.

name: Hunter Stennett
text: Never had a bad pizza from a Little Caesars, and the employees are friendly every time I'm there. They have waiting benches/chairs for special/large orders, and as always have ready to go pizza available.
